com.storytron.swat.util

Class FilterBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.storytron.swat.util.FilterBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class FilterBox
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Implements a filter box that allows the user selecting options from a menu using the keyboard or the mouse.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setRefreshSelectionType

        public void setRefreshSelectionType(int refreshType)
        Tells how the selection must be updated when refreshing the filter box.

        Possible values are REFRESH_TO_CURRENT and REFRESH_TO_FIRST.
